title: Leaver buster busts innocent person..
body:
Hello,
  so for some reason, even tho 90% of the times everything works fine, there is that 10% chance that league of legends when launching the game something happens and it tells me to try again.
Every time I pressed the retry button it didnt work and I got the same message again so since then I just hit close and then the reconnect button from the client.
But there have been many of these times that even though the game is finally loading and the game starts everyone agrees on the remake even if I am in the game and I get a Leaver buster low priority queue...


How do I fix that or can RIOT do something about it?
Because right now I lost my lp and most importantly I got a 20 something low priority queue even though the message said it was going to be a 5 minute one and I have done nothing to deserve it..
I never actually quit the game and I never dodge games.
Im on a one year old laptop that to be fair it does struggle a bit in general but not with league.. if something happens when league is on it is very rare and random so I can never predict it to avoid it.. I cant afford a new laptop or PC for that matter and frankly I dont have to.

I will also leave a poll to see how many agree that leaver-buster has to be updated.

replies.body:
Regardless of the reason the disconnection happens, your absence from the match negatively impacts **everyone** involved in the match. This is a big reason why the system is designed to treat all disconnections equally and why we aren't able to modify these penalties.

From your description, it sounds as if your connection to our servers is unstable and could be seeing inconsistent issues in reaching our platform services. I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in order to ensure your settings aren't conflicting with League.

Let me know if you run into further issues with this.
